alfredsnippet.snippet:
Imagine that something happens to our culture and we are wiped off the Earth.  And a future culture arrives to try to understand us.  Suppose their science is just like ours, and they formulate specialists ...

Some of these specialists only study skyscrapers.

Some only study our films.

Some only study our computers.

Some only study our cars.

(cont'd)
alfredsnippet.name: WIP - Fragmented Specialist View of the Pagans - 1
